title: Courtney Stodden reveals her mom 'fell in love' with her husband Doug Hutchison
title_page: Courtney Stodden reveals her mom 'fell in love' with her husband Doug Hutchison | Daily Mail Online
text:
Courtney Stodden has revealed that her mother Krista Keller fell in love with her much older husband Doug Hutchison.
The 21-year-old made the admission during the explosive first trailer for new show, The Mother/Daughter Experiment: Celebrity Edition.
The reality star snapped at her mom: 'What mother would do that to her daughter? To fall in love with her own husband?'
Shocker: Courtney Stodden reveals the reason why she's angry with her mom during a preview clip for the show, The Mother/Daughter experiment
At 55, Courtney's husband is 34 years her senior, while 56-year-old Krista is much closer in age to him.
The blonde married The Green Mile star in 2011, when she was only 16 years old.
Courtney and Krista are one of six mother-daughter duos featured in the Lifetime show, which is set to premiere in March.
Each duo works out their issues through intensive therapy with Dr. Debbie Magids over an eight week period.
Locking horns: Courtney says that her mother fell in love with her much older husband Doug Hutchison
Resolution: The 21-year-old is one of six mother-daughter duos featured in the Lifetime show, which is set to premiere in March
Other mom and daughter sets include: the former Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills star Kim Richards, 51, and her daughter, Kimberly Jackson; Heidi Montag and her mom Darlene Egelhoff; and Shar Jackson and her daughter Cassie.
Bad Girls Club star Natalie Nunn and her mom, Karen; Jessica Canseco from Hollywood Exe's and her daughter Josie also star in the upcoming reality show.
And the other participants are also sure to provide plenty of drama, with Kim shown pushing Heidi at one point in the trailer.
Ready to start: Each duo works out their issues through intensive therapy with Dr. Debbie Magids over an eight week period
Focused: Courtney's actor husband Doug is 34 years old than her at 55, while Krista is 56
Kim is also seen swearing at Natalie, who fires back: 'This ain't f***ing Beverly Hills.'
In the clip, Kim can be seen in a shouting match with daughter Kimberly, saying: 'Don't tell me what to do, I'm defending myself!'
Later her daughter can be seen weeping as she tells her mom: 'I want you to stay healthy always.'
Starting over: During the show, the blonde works on repairing her relationship with her mother with the help of Dr. Magids
Uh oh: In another portion of the trailer, Kim Richards can be seen pushing Heidi Montag
Kim also breaks down and says: 'I try not to cry. It's been a hard time.'
Toward the end of the preview clip, Courtney is caught hugging her mom, appearing to be on the path to resolving their issues.
Krista admitted to US Weekly last June that she is no longer in contact with her daughter, telling the magazine that: 'Courtney and I are estranged. We're not speaking. It's not good.'
Tough talk: The 51-year-old and her daughter Kimberly are seen getting emotional on the show
Hot headed: In a clip from the show, Kim can be seen in a shouting match with Kimberly, saying: 'Don't tell me what to do, I'm defending myself!'
Courtney did not take her mother speaking to the press lightly and tweeted a handwritten statement explaining her side of the falling out.
She said: 'My mom's desire to be famous interfered with her ability to manager me effectively. She craved the limelight so much she felt that, I, her daughter, was standing in her way.'
Adding: 'I was forced to have her resign. I do wish her the best. She's my mother and I'll always love her.'
